meanings.definition: A person or thing that imprints.
meanings.sent1: The imprinter stamped the logo on the paper.
meanings.sent2: The imprinter left a mark on the surface.
meanings.sent3: The little imprinter teddy bear made footprints in the sand.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was an imprinter of joy on everyone she met.
meanings.sent5: The imprinter's touch was gentle yet firm, leaving a lasting impression.

meanings.definition: A machine or device used for imprinting.
meanings.sent1: The imprinter in the office was used to mark documents.
meanings.sent2: The imprinter hummed as it stamped each envelope.
meanings.sent3: The imprinter printer ran out of ink at the worst time.
meanings.sent4: The imprinter machine worked tirelessly, never tiring of its task.
meanings.sent5: The imprinter device was a marvel of modern technology, precise and efficient.

meanings.definition: To impress or fix (a thought, idea, image, etc.) firmly in the mind.
meanings.sent1: She tried to imprinter the lyrics of the song in her memory.
meanings.sent2: The teacher's words imprintered the importance of kindness on the students.
meanings.sent3: He jokingly imprintered the idea of a flying elephant in her mind.
meanings.sent4: The sunset imprintered a sense of peace that lingered long after.
meanings.sent5: The movie imprintered scenes of adventure that sparked her imagination.
